name: logo
label: Logo
description: The logo image used for the theme. Supports .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files.

name: space_2
label: Space 2
description: This setting controls the second space on the homepage below the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('','Nothing'),('news_list.html','Featured News with list'),('articles_list.html','Featured Article with list')] #<box_list>

name: space_3
label: Space 3
description: This setting controls the left small space under the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: space_4
label: Space 4
description: This setting controls the middle small space under the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: space_5
label: Space 5
description: This setting controls the right small space under the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: space_6
label: Space 6
description: This setting controls the second space in the sidebar. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('','Nothing'),('directories_list_title.html','Directory List with Title'),('events_list_title_date_time.html','Events List with Title Date'),('jobs_list_title_location.html','Jobs List'),('single_event.html','Single Event')] #<box_list>

label: Space 7
description: This setting controls the third space in the sidebar. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('','Nothing'),('directories_list_title.html','Directory List with Title'),('events_list_title_date_time.html','Events List with Title Date'),('jobs_list_title_location.html','Jobs List'),('single_event.html','Single Event')] #<box_list>
